Hi! I'm Andrea Gilardi and I'm a research fellow at the University of Milano - Bicocca. I work mainly on spatial and spatio-temporal models on linear networks. Love hiking and coding with R. 

## Main publications

1. **Gilardi, A.**, Borgoni, R., Presicce, L., Mateu, J., Measurement Error Models for Spatial Network Lattice Data:
Analysis of Car Crashes in Leeds. Under review. [Preprint](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2201.02394.pdf);
1. **Gilardi, A.**, Borgoni, R., Mateu, J., A non-separable first-order spatio-temporal intensity for events on linear networks: an application to ambulance interventions. Under review. [Preprint](https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.00457).
1. **Gilardi, A.**, Lovelace, R., Padgham, M. Data structures and methods for reproducible street network analysis: overview and implementations in R. Under review. [Preprint](https://osf.io/78yub).
1. **Gilardi, A.**, Mateu, J., Borgoni, R., Lovelace, R., Multivariate hierarchical analysis of car crashes data considering a spatial network lattice. *Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series A (Statistics in Society)*. [http://doi.org/10.1111/rssa.12823](http://doi.org/10.1111/rssa.12823).
1. Borgoni, R., **Gilardi, A.**, & Zappa, D. (2020). Assessing the Risk of Car Crashes in Road Networks. Social Indicators Research, 1-19.[https://doi.org/10.1007/s11205-020-02295-x](https://doi.org/10.1007/s11205-020-02295-x). 

## Software

I'm the author of two R packages published on CRAN, namely [osmextract](https://cran.r-project.org/package=osmextract) and [sfnetworks](https://cran.r-project.org/package=sfnetworks). 

Get the complete curriculum vitae from [here](https://github.com/agila5/cv/raw/master/gilardi_cv.pdf).
